participant_1.background:
I will not force my musical taste on others, but they are welcome to listen to it if they want.
i was the first born child.
i own a french bulldog.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy eating fruit with my child when we spend time together.
I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close.
i play jazz piano in a band.
I run track for myself.
I need a space where I can be creative and have room for my art supplies.

content.text: It's going well! I just got back from a concert.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of music did you see?
It was a jazz band. I really enjoyed it.
I love jazz! I play jazz piano in a band.
That's so cool! I don't know how to play any instruments.
It's not too hard to learn. I started when I was in high school.
I've always been more interested in sports. I run track and field.
That's really impressive! I've never been much of a runner.
It's a lot of fun! I like the feeling of being able to push myself and run faster and faster.
I can see how that would be fun. I'm more of a creative person. I love to draw and paint.
That's really cool too! I wish I was more artistic.
It's just a matter of practice. Anyone can be artistic if they keep at it.
I guess you're right! I'll have to give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun
